name: Main St
description: The western terminus of Main Street, a quiet end to a bustling thoroughfare. You are at the western end of Main St. The street continues to the east, leading back toward the center of town, a ribbon of charming commerce. The air is filled with the scent of freshly baked bread from a nearby bakery and the faint, sweet smell of blooming flowers. The storefronts here are all occupied, their windows displaying the latest in fashion and technology.
